channel.title: machine learning on Yutong LIU's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in machine learning on Yutong LIU's Blog

item.title: Joke Generator
item.description: The blog is based on the project of joke generator, which aims to produce a certain joke related the topic words we provide for the network. Basic idea is inspired by the neural machine translation, which can translate a sequence to another with a different length. My model is optimized from the previous neural network, which considers topic words as the input language and convert them into a joke style sentence.
